0.0.1.name: wordpress/tweetboard-for-wordpress
0.0.1.description: This is a very basic plugin which integrates Tweetboard into your Wordpress installation. Once you're signed up (and approved) and have installed this plugin, the only configuration you need is to enter your twitter username in the configuration page of the plugin, to be up and running.
